law.catch_line: Levy of tax on offenders engaging in a taxable activity -- Rates.

text.section: For the purpose of calculating the tax levied pursuant to subsections (1)(b), (1)(c), and (1)(d) of this section, the quantity shall be measured by the weight of the marijuana or controlled substance, whether pure, impure, or diluted, or by dosage units when a controlled substance is not sold by weight.
An offender lawfully engaged in a taxable activity shall be exempt from the tax imposed by this section if the offender is not in violation of any law which authorizes him to engage in the activity.

law.history: Amended 2001 Ky. Acts ch. 155, sec. 2, effective June 21, 2001. -- Created 1994 Ky. Acts ch. 315, sec. 2, effective July 15, 1994.
